page.title: 08Holidays in Laggan
page.content: Self catering holidays have become very much in vogue in our area. Farmer's wives provide well equipped cottages & houses from April - October. There are 10 holiday cottages and 2 small caravan sites on Blaragie farm and we have 1 hotel which doubles as a public house.The type of tourists who visit Laggan enjoy the peace & quiet. Some wish for solitude. Others who visit every year almost "go native" and join in clubs, societies and funtions. Some indeed return to live here. Laggan aims to provide the visitor with good value and with the values of a good neighbour.
